third_party_testing.title: Our third party product testing pledge.
third_party_testing.desc: We believe in full transparency with our product testing, and this page show you how to find our product tests easily.

why_regenerative.title: An intro to regenerative agriculture.
why_regenerative.desc: Regenerative agriculture is a cornerstone of our business model. Learn a bit about what it entails here.

transparent_pricing.title: We offer transparent pricing for CBD products
transparent_pricing.desc: Transparency in pricing is hard to come by, but crucially important for customers to make informed decisions about what they buy. We show per gram pricing to make this easier.

which_product.title: How to Decide what CBD product to buy
which_product.desc: Whether you are talking about salve or sublingual oils, quantity or strength of product, there is a lot to consider when picking which CBD product to buy.
